attributes.action: remove speed limiters on hgv's and to increase the motorway speed limit to 70mph or 55mph when wet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: trucks overtake one another very slowly. when car drivers don't concentrate they slow down behind the trucks. if trucks and cars could do the same speed then there would be very little congestion. the driver can get his/her work done in less time. the rpm can be reduced by means of an alternative diff.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
